short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the new tab page with an external website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab into a hub of productivity and information with New Tab Pulse. This extension replaces the default new tab page with a sleek interface featuring a powerful search box and dynamic news feeds.

Powerful Search: Quickly search the web with a clean and intuitive search box right on your new tab page.

Fresh News Feeds: Stay updated with the latest headlines and trending stories from around the world, all in one place.

Elevate your browsing experience and stay informed with New Tab Pulse.
